Yrsin.RejectPendant: Sorry, I don't know what that I'm supposed to do with this.$1
Yrsin.RejectTea: Sorry, I don't know what that I'm supposed to do with this.$1
Yrsin.NotFriend_Door: You shouldn't pry into the underground.
Yrsin.Gifts.Loved: Oh? A pleasant surprise.$1#$b#I'll see if Syrs is interested in lunch with this today.$1
Yrsin.Gifts.Liked: Glittering scales, glittering metals. All quite useful to this shark, thanks, love.$1
Yrsin.Gifts.Neutral: ...?#$b#You'll get nothing out of me for this, love.$7
Yrsin.breakUp: Thought you'd be smarter than this, love.$9#$b#But what's the mundane colloquial?$9#$b#More fish in the sea?$9#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Message "Yrsin is ignoring you."
Yrsin.divorced: Mermadics don't really understand 'divorce' as you mundanes do, but I've been around long enough to understand what it means.$9#$e#You'll find no favors from me, love.$9
Yrsin.DumpsterDiveComment: ...Interesting.$1#$b#Don't mind me, love.$1#$b#Sometimes, times are hard, no?$6
Yrsin.HitBySlingshot: Testing my reflexes, love?$9#$b#I assure you, I am perfectly healthy.$9#$action spacechase0.SpaceCore_DamageCurrentFarmer 50
Yrsin.SpouseFarmhouseClutter: It does pique my interest, watching mundanes live their lives.$4#$b#I wouldn't expect you to live like a hermit crab, though.$6
Yrsin.SpouseGiftJealous: Pardon?$1#$b#Mermadics don't really care much for trinkets given to others.$6
Yrsin.Spouse_MonstersInHouse: Keeping my reflexes up in shape, love?$7#$b#Rest assured, I'm still as much as a top-tier hunter as I was in Grandberg.$7
Yrsin.SpouseStardrop: I come across trinkets like these in my deals, love.$1#$b#Overheard you the other day and figured this be more helpful to you than me.$6
Yrsin.WipedMemory: ...Pardon?$7#$b#You think paltry magic like that can affect me?$7
Yrsin.AcceptBouquet: Ah, is this a part of the mundane tradition of putting a label on our relationship?$9#$b#I'll comply, for now, love.$6
Yrsin.MovieInvitation: Mmn? Moving pictures?$8#$b#Sure, mundane interests pique mine, it's good to keep on top of market interests.$9
Yrsin.RejectBouquet: You'll have to work a little harder to catch this shark's interest, love.$6
Yrsin.RejectGift_Divorced: Not particularly interested in someone trying to mend a mistake they've made, love.$9
Yrsin.RejectMermaidPendant: Not quite sure what this is meant for, love.$1
Yrsin.RejectMovieTicket: Maybe next time, love, big ol' baddie shark has business to attend to today.$6
Yrsin.GreenRain: We mermadics are particularly fond of this 'green rain' you so call it.$1#$b#It's quite soothing to the skin.$6
Yrsin.GreenRainFinished: And like that, my luxurious self care day is gone.$2#$b#Shame.$6
Yrsin.Engaged: Shall we have a mermadic celebration?$1#$b#It involves hunting, if you're so inclined.$6
Yrsin.AfterWedding: Like a tidal wave, the festivities of a mermadic wedding come to a close.$6#$b#Shall I look forward to your relatively short lifespan and remember these days fondly?$6
BETAS.Yrsin.Monday_0: I've got business to attend to, love.$1
BETAS.Yrsin.Monday_1: What, did you want to keep Yrrek company?$6
BETAS.Yrsin.Monday_2: Big ol' baddy shark is handling business just fine, love.$7
BETAS.Yrsin.Monday_3: Yrrek, escort our guest out.$9#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_WarpFarmer Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Moor <X> <Y> <FacingDirection>
Yrsin.Monday_0: Yrrek?$2#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "Did you find that one snitch?"#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "Yes Boss. He's being held... *Ahem*" 3000 3000
Yrsin.Monday_1: Yrrek?$2#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "How's the situation at the armory?"#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "Yes Boss. We've got stores for two platoo-- *Ahem*" 3000 3000
Yrsin.Monday_2: Yrrek?$1#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "What would you like for lunch today?"#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "Oh! Boss I'd really like some lobster! I bet Yrnal would like shrimp." 3000 3000
Yrsin.Monday_3: Yrrek?$2#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "How are the new recruits?"#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "Yes Boss. Six four, eighty, and A all seem like they would have promis-- *Ahem*" 3000 3000
Yrsin.Monday2_0: Yrrek?$2#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "What of our current personnel?"#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "Yes Boss. No injuries so far, The Astute has brought back-- *Ahem*" 3000 3000
Yrsin.Monday2_1: Yrrek?$2#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "Have you heard anything from Trinity?"#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "Yes Boss. Trinity is currently asking for more citrus supplies." 3000 3000#$e#More citrus, eh?$1#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "*Chuckles*" 3000 3000
Yrsin.Monday2_2: Yrrek?$2#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "Has Thandael said anything recently?"#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "Yes Boss. Thandael has been asking for more supplie-- *Ahem*" 3000 3000
Yrsin.Monday2_3: Yrrek?$1#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "Shall we have something special for lunch today?"#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "Oh! Boss! Can we have caviar from Fili's today?!" 3000 3000
BETAS.Yrsin.Monday2_1: Yrrek, see to that preparations will be ready by seven.
BETAS.Yrsin.Monday2_2: --Yes?$7#$b#Yes, you've got roughly five days for your next payment date--$7#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Message "Yrsin is on the phone..."
BETAS.Yrsin.Monday2_3: Yrrek, escort our guest out.$7#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_WarpFarmer Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Moor <X> <Y> <FacingDirection>
Yrsin.Monday4_0: Yrrek?$2#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "Have you heard anything through the scouts?"#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "Yes Boss. Nightingale City looks promising. Shall we initiate a trade deal?" 3000 3000
Yrsin.Monday4_1: Yrrek?$2#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "Is there any word of the whereabouts of the Grand Magus?"#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "No Boss. Last reported sighting was six months ago." 3000 3000
Yrsin.Monday4_2: Yrrek?$1#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "Any interesting liquor you'd like to try today?"#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "Oh! Boss! Can we try that new 'Six Gin' we got from Pelican Town?" 3000 3000
Yrsin.Monday4_3: Yrrek?$1#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "Do any of the furniture suppliers look good?"#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "Yes Boss. Actually there's a new supplier under the moniker 'Tea', she also goes by Lina." 3000 3000
BETAS.Yrsin.Monday4_0: ...Hmm. I'll need to calculate the costs for building a Station Network for Nightingale City...$2#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "Beyond that... would that engineer... Pathos? Even be available to work..."#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Message "Seems like Yrsin is contemplating work..."
BETAS.Yrsin.Monday4_1: Yrrek, how long are we looking at the scale of that project between Nightingale City?#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_DialogueBox Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "We're quite unsure, Boss. Some engineers have told us between a month and a year."#$b#Hmm...$7#$b#That should give us a decent enough time to get the supplies necessary for construction...$7
BETAS.Yrsin.Monday4_2: ...Beyond the investments, would there be immigrants, Yrrek?#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_DialogueBox Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "I haven't looked into anyone wishing to immigrate yet, Boss. But I'll get on it.$h"#$b#Good. Keep me updated.
Yrsin.Monday6_0: Yrrek?$1#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "Have you fed the strays today?"#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "Yes Boss. The Union Cats are doing quite well today, they send their regards for the fresh fish." 3000 3000#$e#Well that's good.$1#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "*Chuckles*" 3000 3000
Yrsin.Monday6_1: Yrrek?$1#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "What's going on in the schedule today?"#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "Yes Boss. Today you are due for the meeting with Penumbra, a lunch front with Thandael, and-- *Ahem*" 3000 3000
Yrsin.Monday6_2: Yrrek?$2#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "What of Konryn's mood?"#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "Yes Boss. King Konryn is actually quite pleased with how things are running smoothly." 3000 3000
Yrsin.Monday6_3: Yrrek?$1#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "What shall we have for lunch today?"#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "Oh! Boss! Can we have some tteokbokki today?" 3000 3000 true
BETAS.Yrsin.Monday6_0: ...?#$e#Would you like to eat with us, love?$1
BETAS.Yrsin.Monday6_1: Food's on the spicier side, if you can't handle it then there isn't much we can offer.$1
BETAS.Yrsin.Monday6_2: ...?#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Message "Yrsin has food in his mouth."
Yrsin.Platonic.Monday8_0: Yrrek?$1#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "What other things are on the dock?"#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "Yes Boss. BETAS.Yrsin.Monday10_0: ...You'll have to excuse my rough handling, sweetheart.$9#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_WarpFarmer Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Moor <X> <Y> <FacingDirection>

BETAS.Yrsin.Monday10_2: ...This is for your own good.$9#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_WarpFarmer Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Moor <X> <Y> <FacingDirection>

BETAS.Yrsin.Tuesday_0: Well hello, love.$6#$b#Keeping tabs on 'The' Apex Predator?$1
BETAS.Yrsin.Tuesday_1: You'll get no secrets out of me, love.#$b#Maybe once you've become better at sneaking around.$6
BETAS.Yrsin.Tuesday_2: Stories of my hometown?#$b#A quaint place, warm waters, and consistent feeding grounds.$1#$b#Don't know if your kind would be able to stay, though.$6
BETAS.Yrsin.Tuesday_3: Scared of the teeth?$1#$b#We tend to only mark our territories, no need to be so afraid.$6
Yrsin.Tuesday_0: Yrrek?$2#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "What do the prices of emeralds look like?"#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "Yes Boss. It looks as if emeralds have-- *Ahem*" 3000 3000
Yrsin.Tuesday_1: Yrrek?$2#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "Do we have any word from the nomadics?"#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "Yes Boss. Seelie and Rasvata are finishing up paperwork to-- *Ahem*" 3000 3000
Yrsin.Tuesday_2: Yrrek?$2#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "Has Edelweiss given you an update?"#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "Yes Boss. Thirty seven potions are finished and sixty-- *Ahem*" 3000 3000
Yrsin.Tuesday_3: Yrrek?$2#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "Do we have any tradeships coming in?"#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "Yes Boss. Actually, one from Tual has docked and is awaiting you-- *Ahem*" 3000 3000
Yrsin.Tuesday2_0: I would say it is a surprise that you're here, @, but I guess I've gotten used to it.$9#$b#Still can't give you preferential treatment, though, work proceeds.$6
Yrsin.Tuesday2_1: Yrrek, do we have any word from Commonwealth?$5#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "Yes Boss. Thetlin is asking for supplies."#$e#...Shit.$5#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_ShakeNpc Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "Shit!" 3000 0 true

Boss..." 3000 3000 true#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Message "...#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "*Sigh*" 3000 0 true#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "*Sigh*" 3000 0 true
BETAS.Yrsin.Tuesday2_0: ...#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_ShakeNpc Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin 10000#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Message "Seems like Yrsin is asleep."#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_DialogueBox Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "I don't suggest bothering Boss today.$5"

BETAS.Yrsin.Tuesday2_2: ...#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_ShakeNpc Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin 10000#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Message "Seems like Yrsin is asleep."#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_DialogueBox Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "Listen, you're being a nuisance.$5"

Yrsin.Tuesday4_0: Acting a little shameless, are we, love?$7#$b#Barging into a shark's den has some bravery, I'll give you that.$6
Yrsin.Tuesday4_1: $action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "*Yawn*" 3000 0 true#$e#Ah, pardon me, love.$8#$b#Mondays are always our busiest days, I'm only now able to relax a little.$6
Yrsin.Tuesday4_2: It's...$8#$b#Nap...$8#$b#Time...$8#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "ZzzZzzzzZz" 3000 0 true#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "Shh... Tuesday is the only day Boss can rest peacefully." 3000 3000 true#$e#Ssss...$8#$e#Zzzz...$8#$e#Ss...?$2
BETAS.Yrsin.Tuesday4_0: ...$9#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Message "Yrsin?"#$e#Nrrnm?$7#$b#Well, good morning love. Caught me slippin' it seems.$1
BETAS.Yrsin.Tuesday4_1: ...$9#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Message "Yrsin?"#$e#...$9#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_DialogueBox Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrrek "If it's not important business, you should leave Boss alone."#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_WarpFarmer Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Moor <X> <Y> <FacingDirection>
BETAS.Yrsin.Tuesday4_3: ...$9#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Message "Yrsin?"#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_ShakeNpc Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin 10000#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "Five... no... call in... eight... hours..."
Yrsin.Tuesday6_0: Mmn?$2#$b#Feels like it's gonna rain tomorrow...$2#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_WeatherForTomorrow {{ModId}} GreenRain
BETAS.Yrsin.Tuesday6_0: Lucid today? Me?$7#$b#Ah, you mean Tuesdays.$1#$b#Yes, work tends to get the busiest at the start of the work week.$6
BETAS.Yrsin.Tuesday6_1: Mmmn?$1#$b#Do I not work today?$1#$b#Most of the work gets finished as soon as the sun rises on Tuesdays.$3#$b#Care to relax with me today, love?$6

BETAS.Yrsin.Tuesday6_3: ...?$3#$b#This is spicier than I'm used to, what?$7

BETAS.Yrsin.Tuesday8_0: Pardon me, sweetheart. Got calls to make.$1#$b#This is Yrsin, calling about some acquisitions.$9#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Message "Seems like Yrsin is a little busy."
BETAS.Yrsin.Tuesday8_1: Well, yes, sir. Your next payment is in roughly twenty days, thank you for your patronage.$9#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Message "Seems like Yrsin is a little busy."
BETAS.Yrsin.Tuesday8_2: Mhm, yes. The rate at which payments would occur would be--#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Message "Seems like Yrsin is a little busy."
BETAS.Yrsin.Tuesday8_3: Yes, Syrsa can finalize the rest of the paperwork on the office--#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Message "Seems like Yrsin is a little busy."
Yrsin.Platonic.Tuesday10_0: Give me a moment, love.$1#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "*BrrRrRrrRing*" 3000 0 true#$e#...#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_DialogueBox Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Thandael "Yo, Sinny! To what do I owe the pleasure?$1"#$e#...$7#$b#You're lucky I'm in a good mood today, Than.$7#$b#I need an update on the head of the snake.#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_DialogueBox Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Thandael "Oh, sure. So the schedule for the week looks like a meeting with an embassador across the sea."#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Message "Seems like Yrsin is busy."
Yrsin.Platonic.Tuesday10_1: Give me a moment, love.$1#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "*BrrRrRrrRing*" 3000 0 true#$e#...$1#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_DialogueBox Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrnal "Helooo Boss.$6"#$e#Yrna, what would you like to eat this afternoon?$1#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_DialogueBox Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrnal "Oh! Can we have a buffet today?$1"#$e#A buffet, huh?$1#$b#I assume you want your usual, shrimp?$6#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_DialogueBox Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrnal "Oh you know me so well Boss~$1"#$e#Of course.$1#$b#Go ahead and call Syrs and Yrrek and we'll set something up later on today.$1#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_DialogueBox Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrnal "Okay! Your usual white-fish?$3"#$e#You know me so well.$7#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Message "Seems like Yrsin is busy."
Yrsin.Platonic.Tuesday10_2: Sorry, love, today isn't a good time.$7#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_WarpFarmer Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Moor <X> <Y> <FacingDirection>

Yrsin.Romantic.Tuesday10_0: Shh. Close your eyes.$8#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_FadeToBlack 3000#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_DelayedAction "Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Message \"A kiss was placed on my cheek.\"" 1000
Yrsin.Romantic.Tuesday10_1: Today's an extremely busy day, you'll have to pardon my manners, sweetheart.$5
Yrsin.Romantic.Tuesday10_2: Even though it is public knowledge of our relationship, I still cannot afford the kiddie gloves with you, sweetheart.$6#$b#Gotta keep the respect of the people.$7
Yrsin.Romantic.Tuesday10_3: It is quite often that you visit me during work hours, sweetheart, but you'll have to pardon my manners.$9#$b#Life still moves on and the wicked don't rest.$6
BETAS.Yrsin.Tuesday10_2: Sorry, love, today isn't a good time.$7#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_WarpFarmer Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Moor <X> <Y> <FacingDirection>

BETAS.Yrsin.Wednesday_0: Did Yrrek let you in?#$b#I'll need to reassess his raise, it seems.
BETAS.Yrsin.Wednesday_1: There is nothing of interest to you here, love.#$b#Best see yourself out, the door is right there.
BETAS.Yrsin.Wednesday_2: I'm a very busy shark, love.#$b#You better have a good reason for interrupting my day.
BETAS.Yrsin.Wednesday_3: Syrsa would be happy to entertain you, love.#$b#I'm quite busy today.

BETAS.Yrsin.Thursday_0: Next time you try a sneak attack, use your height to your advantage.$1#$b#You'll have an easier time from below than above.$6
BETAS.Yrsin.Thursday_1: Gallivanting in the back alleys will get you into dangerous situations.$4#$b#Or have you decided to tempt fate?$1
BETAS.Yrsin.Thursday_2: I'm just having a break from the hustle and bustle of my workspace.#$b#Why? Plan to keep me company?$1
BETAS.Yrsin.Thursday_3: The fins are sensitive, love.#$b#Best not to touch unless you wish to face the consequences.$6
Yrsin.Thursday_0: The coral?#$b#They're mermadic tradition to show the leader of a pack.$1
Yrsin.Thursday_1: Can't get enough of the thrill of danger?$1#$b#I'd call you reckless, but everyone chases after what they can't have.$6
Yrsin.Thursday_2: Should I call you careless, or a fool?$1#$b#Seeking me out shouldn't be in your best interest.$6
Yrsin.Thursday_3: Don't...$2#$b#Move...$5#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Message "Yrsin is breathing deeply."#$e#You're treading a dangerous path, @.$2#$b#You should leave soon.$5
BETAS.Yrsin.Friday_0: Curious as to why I'm here?$4#$b#The food is good, I curated it.$1
BETAS.Yrsin.Friday_1: Yrnal is a distant relative of mine, cross her and you'll cross me as well, love.$7
BETAS.Yrsin.Friday_2: Mmn?#$b#I wouldn't suggest the wine from here, love.$5#$b#Has a bit of 'iron' for us mermadics if you catch my drift.$6
BETAS.Yrsin.Friday_3: What?$1#$b#A crime boss can't have a day off?$6
Yrsin.Friday_0: Mmn. Today's one of my days to rest, love.#$b#Mind coming a different day?$4
Yrsin.Friday_1: Rest days are important, today so happens to be mine.$6
Yrsin.Friday_2: ...$8#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Message "Is Yrsin... sleeping with his eyes open?"#$e#...?$3#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Message "Best not to wake a sleeping shark."
Yrsin.Friday_3: ...$8#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Message "'Yrsin?'"#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Message "Seems like he's asleep with his eyes open."
Yrsin.Saturday_0: Trin, baby, come on!$1#$action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Yrsin "No need to be so hostile!" 3000 0#$action SpiderButtons.BETAS_TextAboveHead Aviroen.VoidsentCP_Trinity "You're lucky I'm uninterested in shark meat today." 3000 2000#$e#No need to be so prickly, baby.$6
